item.title: Max Payne 3 – PlayStation 3
item.dc:creator: webmaster
item.description:
Price:12.99
Huge selection of new & used video games. Great deals. Free shipping on all orders. 30-day money-back guarantee. We have everything from Atari to PS4. Item specifics Condition: Good : An item in used but good condition. May have minor damage to jewel case including scuffs or cracks, or to the item cover including scuffs, scratches, or cracks. The cover art and liner notes are included for a CD. VHS or DVD box is included. Video game instructions are included. No skipping on CD/DVD. No fuzzy/snowy frames on VHS tape. See the seller’s listing for full details and description of any imperfections. See all condition definitions– opens in a new window or tab Seller Notes: “GAME DISK ONLY! Every game we sell is GUARANTEED TO WORK! May have markings, discoloration, scratches, or other cosmetic flaws. This does not affect gameplay.” Platform: Sony PlayStation 3 Rating: M – Mature Release Year: 2012 Genre: Shooter Sports Sub-Genre: Shooter Game Name: Max Payne 3 MPN: 710425376061 UPC: 710425376061 Max Payne 3 (Sony PlayStation 3, 2012) — FREE SHIPPING!! Detailed item info Product Information The series that introduced “bullet-time” gunplay for dramatic and artful slow-motion shooting sequences returns after a seven-year hiatus with Max Payne 3. The gritty and vengeful protagonist, whose family was viciously murdered by drug addicts, has left his role as a New York City detective to start a clean slate in another country: Sao Paulo, Brazil. Yet Payne cannot escape the violence that has tragically shaped his character. Twelve years after the events from the second game, Payne finds himself victim of a double cross. An older, wearier Payne must once again rely on his primal instincts to find a way out of his quandary. The action takes place from a third-person perspective as Payne utilizes an assortment of weapons to mete out his distinctive brand of justice. For the first time in the series, Max Payne 3 includes a multiplayer component that has players earning experience, acquiring skills, and completing objectives in a sequence of events. Players will choose a faction and then battle the opposing team, using bullet-time and slow-motion dodges to gain a tactical edge on the competition. Objectives range from collecting duffel bags of money to disarming bombs to conquering territory. Product Highlights Video Product Identifiers Publisher Rockstar Games Game Max Payne 3 MPN 37606 UPC 710425376061 Key Features Platform Sony PlayStation 3 ESRB Rating M – Mature Genre Shooter Location USA Tech Details ESRB Descriptor Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Partial Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Drugs and Alcohol Control Elements Gamepad/Joystick Number of Players 1-16 Release Year 2012 Game Special Features Engage in stylized shootouts with an assortment of weapons Features the all-new setting of Sao Paulo, Brazil Storyline takes place 12 years after Max Payne 2 Game Series Max Payne Series View on eBay

Max Payne 3 (Sony PlayStation 3, 2012) — FREE SHIPPING!!

Detailed item info

Product Information
The series that introduced “bullet-time” gunplay for dramatic and artful slow-motion shooting sequences returns after a seven-year hiatus with Max Payne 3. The gritty and vengeful protagonist, whose family was viciously murdered by drug addicts, has left his role as a New York City detective to start a clean slate in another country: Sao Paulo, Brazil.

Yet Payne cannot escape the violence that has tragically shaped his character. Twelve years after the events from the second game, Payne finds himself victim of a double cross. An older, wearier Payne must once again rely on his primal instincts to find a way out of his quandary. The action takes place from a third-person perspective as Payne utilizes an assortment of weapons to mete out his distinctive brand of justice.

For the first time in the series, Max Payne 3 includes a multiplayer component that has players earning experience, acquiring skills, and completing objectives in a sequence of events. Players will choose a faction and then battle the opposing team, using bullet-time and slow-motion dodges to gain a tactical edge on the competition. Objectives range from collecting duffel bags of money to disarming bombs to conquering territory.

item.title: Assassin’s Creed: Rogue – PlayStation 3
item.dc:creator: webmaster
item.description:
Price:15.99
Huge selection of new & used video games. Great deals. Free shipping on all orders. 30-day money-back guarantee. We have everything from Atari to PS4. Item specifics Condition: Good : An item in used but good condition. May have minor damage to jewel case including scuffs or cracks, or to the item cover including scuffs, scratches, or cracks. The cover art and liner notes are included for a CD. VHS or DVD box is included. Video game instructions are included. No skipping on CD/DVD. No fuzzy/snowy frames on VHS tape. See the seller’s listing for full details and description of any imperfections. See all condition definitions– opens in a new window or tab Seller Notes: “GAME DISK ONLY! Every game we sell is GUARANTEED TO WORK! May have markings, discoloration, scratches, or other cosmetic flaws. This does not affect gameplay.” Platform: Sony PlayStation 3 Rating: M – Mature Release Year: 2014 Genre: Action/Adventure MPN: 887256000127 Game Name: Assassin's Creed: Rogue UPC: 887256000127 Assassin’s Creed: Rogue (Sony PlayStation 3, 2014) — FREE SHIPPING!! Detailed item info Product Information Gamers can experience the other side of the perpetual conflict at the core of Ubisoft’s historically themed open-world action series as they take control of Assassin-turned-Templar Shay Patrick Cormac in Assassin’s Creed: Rogue. Set in the midst of the French and Indian War, Rogue lets players control Shay as he evolves from a dedicated Assassin into a killer who hunts his former brethren, and the action moves from the crowded streets of 18th-century New York City to the river valleys of colonial America and out into the iceberg-laden waters of the North Atlantic Ocean. Being both a Templar and a former Assassin means Shay has unique weapons and abilities, including a grenade launcher and an air rifle that can be used to fire off various projectiles and enhanced eagle vision that lets him detect hiding Assassins. Rogue also continues the franchise’s latter-day sailing exploits, with gamers taking the helm of the The Morrigan to fight through the frigid North Atlantic and navigate through narrow river passages. New naval options let players break through sheets of ice to find hidden areas, fend off Assassins attempting to board the ship, unleash a steady stream of bullets with the puckle gun, and drop burning oil into the water to set pursuing ships ablaze. Product Highlights Video Product Identifiers Publisher Ubisoft Game Assassin’s Creed: Rogue MPN 887256000127 UPC 887256000127 Key Features Platform Sony PlayStation 3 ESRB Rating M – Mature Genre Action, Adventure Location USA Tech Details ESRB Descriptor Blood, Strong Language, Violence Control Elements Gamepad/Joystick Number of Players 1 Release Year 2014 Game Special Features Take control of a hero who is betrayed by his Assassin brothers and becomes a Templar Explore the streets of colonial New York, navigate narrow river valleys, and sail in frigid seas Use new weapons like an air rifle, a puckle gun, and flaming oil Game Series Assassin’s Creed Series View on eBay

The post Assassin’s Creed: Rogue – PlayStation 3 appeared first on Video Game Warehouse.

Assassin’s Creed: Rogue (Sony PlayStation 3, 2014) — FREE SHIPPING!!

Detailed item info

Product Information
Gamers can experience the other side of the perpetual conflict at the core of Ubisoft’s historically themed open-world action series as they take control of Assassin-turned-Templar Shay Patrick Cormac in Assassin’s Creed: Rogue. Set in the midst of the French and Indian War, Rogue lets players control Shay as he evolves from a dedicated Assassin into a killer who hunts his former brethren, and the action moves from the crowded streets of 18th-century New York City to the river valleys of colonial America and out into the iceberg-laden waters of the North Atlantic Ocean.

Being both a Templar and a former Assassin means Shay has unique weapons and abilities, including a grenade launcher and an air rifle that can be used to fire off various projectiles and enhanced eagle vision that lets him detect hiding Assassins. Rogue also continues the franchise’s latter-day sailing exploits, with gamers taking the helm of the The Morrigan to fight through the frigid North Atlantic and navigate through narrow river passages. New naval options let players break through sheets of ice to find hidden areas, fend off Assassins attempting to board the ship, unleash a steady stream of bullets with the puckle gun, and drop burning oil into the water to set pursuing ships ablaze.
